author: sussman
msg: * ch06.xml: document the 'svnserve --inetd' switch, since it's a new
switch in both trunk and 1.0 branches.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_status.html: Move "Beta" milestone so its position
indicates that 0.35.1 is the latest available tarball.

author: kfogel
msg: Merge SWIG/Perl bindings changes into 1.0, remove them from STATUS:
Catch up r8213 authz_func renaming for SWIG / Perl bindings.
r8238  [mistakenly listed, not actually applied in this commit, see r8269]
Update Perl bindings tests for r8216 API change (no NULL in dir_delta target)
Perl bindings fixes and enhacements to date.

author: sussman
msg: Our tarball-rolling process just pulls precompiled documentation from
svnbook.red-bean.com, but it would be really weird if the tarball's
book source didn't match the precompiled stuff.
